description:
If you're looking for an efficient, clear, independent and objective way to learn the key issues accounting professionals need to know about Bitcoin and Digital Currencies, this course is for you.

This one hour video course is an introduction, including lessons on the basics of Bitcoin, regulatory issues, and the IRS guidelines. While not required, interested students may continue their education with Digital Currency Council Certification Course and then sit for the DCC Certification Exam.

Secure your leadership position in the digital currency economy. Start by taking this course.
title: Bitcoin for Accountants
